title: Account Settings
description: A place to manage all your accounts details and info

desc.profilePicture: Upload a profile picture to personalize your account.
desc.username: The name that identifies you on the platform.
desc.displayName: The name that is displayed to other users.
desc.email: The email address you use to sign in to your account.
desc.password: Set a strong password to protect your account.
desc.dateOfBirth: Set your birthdate and we will give you a surprise!
